title: 22: S1E22 – “Meeting the Makers” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this twenty-second episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you two terrifying tales from Sarah Piper and Aaron Shotwell, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about the choices presented when mere man comes face to face with entities that possess the power to make... or break them. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e22
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
